column1: '''Prologue: One Ring to Rule Them All...''' is the first scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' narrated by Galadriel. An extended edition of this scene was released in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]].

column1: The prologue was renewed when ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' came out.{{fact}} Until then, [[Ian Holm]] had played the young [[Bilbo Baggins]] and the older one as well. But in the film series, the young Bilbo was portrayed by [[Martin Freeman]] and in the renewed prologue you can see him picking up the [[The One Ring
